name: OpenAI GPT3
author: Sean Deaton (@WhatTheFuzz)
description: Queries OpenAI's GPT3 to determine what a given function does.

installinstructions.Darwin: pip3 install --user openai. Under your OpenAI account, create an API key and set it to the environment variable OPENAI_API_KEY inside Binary Ninja's Python console.
installinstructions.Linux: pip3 install --user openai. Under your OpenAI account, create an API key and set it to the environment variable OPENAI_API_KEY inside Binary Ninja's Python console.
